label: anomaly
description: Detect cross-property coordination issues - HVAC left running at primary residence while user traveled to vacation home 200km away
reasoning: Observation window: 2026-03-13T00:00:00 to 2026-03-17T23:00:00 (5 day(s)); context: season=Winter, weather=Sunny, occupancy=weekday_worker; total_events=891; top_rooms=basement,bedroom. Evidence: living_room_temp_sensor (living_room): 121 events; first FAILURE_START:OFFLINE @ 2026-03-13T00:00:00; last OFFLINE @ 2026-03-17T23:00:00 | basement_humidity_sensor (basement): 120 events; range 22.5%→48.4% (min @ 2025-12-04T08:00:00, max @ 2025-12-03T17:00:00); last 41.0% @ 2026-03-17T23:00:00 | bedroom_co2_sensor (bedroom): 120 events; range 400.0ppm→1881.0ppm (min @ 2026-03-13T18:00:00, max @ 2025-12-03T06:00:00); last 993ppm @ 2026-03-17T23:00:00 Interpretation: several device streams exhibit trajectories or state patterns that deviate from what the configured routine and cross-device dependencies would typically produce. Potential impact: sustained misbehavior in environmental control, security, or power management can reduce comfort, increase energy use, or create safety risks.
